unnormalised: Hey everyone, interesting discussion! Training like PT Usha did back in the day was intense. My coach in Delhi, Dr. Sharma, always emphasized discipline. We'd run 10 km every morning! Now, personalized plans are key. My cousin, Rohan, uses a fancy app in Bangalore. It even considers the size of his home gym (around 200 sq ft!). Costs Rs. 5000/month though! What do you guys think about HIIT vs. endurance for marathon training?
normalised: Hey everyone, interesting discussion! Training like P T Usha did back in the day was intense. My coach in Delhi, Doctor Sharma, always emphasized discipline. We'd run ten kilometer every morning! Now, personalized plans are key. My cousin, Rohan, uses a fancy app in Bangalore. It even considers the size of his home gym around two hundred square feet! Costs rupee five thousand per month though! What do you guys think about H I I T versus endurance for marathon training?
